Body: Possible Duplicate:  Where can I find stock or custom ROMs for my Android device?  When will my device get the Android 4.0 update (Ice Cream Sandwich)?I'm considering getting an Android mobile phone and Sony Xperia U fits my needs.However, it comes with Sony TimeScape UI (which I don't like) and an old Android version.  Is it possible to install Android 4.0+ on Sony Xperia U? If yes, would you please tell me how?  I'm new to Android world and know nothing :)
Title: Installing ICS or JellyBeans on Sony Xperia U

history.Text: I'm considering getting an Android mobile phone and Sony Xperia U fits my needs.  However, it comes with Sony TimeScape UI (which I don't like) and an old Android version.  Is it possible to install Android 4.0+ on Sony Xperia U? If yes, would you please tell me how?  *I'm new to Android world and know nothing :)*
Installing ICS or JellyBeans on Sony Xperia U
